comments.body: @adamth are the types backwards compatible, i.e no breaking changes for the types between 1.0 and 2.0?

It appears that the only change for the major version bump was updating the babel runtime https://github.com/wix-incubator/mjml-react/commit/7894e20e52db6340e8bad2cbb731f6a3f2430db4
So no breaking changes ðŸŽ‰
Does the table support all of the border properties? i.e could this be replaced by the component also allowing for all `BorderProps`?

It looks like the only supported prop is `border`, oddly enough 
https://github.com/mjmlio/mjml/blob/89fe24c0cb716c9b9531974eb49e2f251a46b22d/packages/mjml-table/src/index.js#L13
